title: High Performance Eco-friendly MgAgSb-Based Thermoelectric Power Generation Device Near Phase Transition Temperatures
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00019F, Paper
Xinzhi Wu, Yangjian Lin, Chengyan Liu, Yupeng Wang, Huan Li, Binghui Ge, Weishu Liu
The utilization of thermoelectric (TE) technology for eco-friendly energy harvesting presents a promising solution for off-grid power generation from waste heat. Despite the dominance of Bi2Te3 TE devices in the...
